name: Llama
text:
Llama
A llama was a patient at Lydecker Veterinary Clinic in February 1989.
When FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper and Sheriff Harry S. Truman went to the clinic to follow up on a lead of a bird belonging to Jacques Renault, the llama walked between them mid-conversation and snorted in Cooper's face. Cooper was unfazed, although the clinic's attendant found the event amusing.
